name: Baxton_Studio_Noonan_Contemporary_Grey_Fabric_Upholstered_Sofa_With_Button_Tufting_And_Nail_Head_Trim_And_Wood_Legs
reviews: I have no complaints about this sofa! I really looks nice with the rest of my décor. Very minimal assembly but make sure your elevator is large enough. We have a fairly average size (medium) elevator in my building and I still had to remove from the box in order to get it into the elevator. Make sure you have at least 2 strong people to move this...it's not a one person job!
Good price could be made better
My sofa is absolutely stunning!!! It's very well made, firm, and it makes my living area look like it's out of a magazine! If I had the space, I would totally buy another one. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
description:
Let this contemporary sofa showcase your style with its unique shape and modern feel. The beautiful gray fabric is button-tufted to provide a luxurious look and feel. Nailhead trim and classic wood legs bring a classic flair to the contemporary design. Wood construction and foam fill means that this chic sofa stands the test of time.
